item.description:
ICA First Fridays:BRAZILIAN STREET PARTY
Celebrate the opening of our Brazilian street art exhibition Os Gemeos with a waterfront dance party! Caipirinhas, Brazilian street food and DJs will take visitors to the heart of the artists' native São Paulo.

Music by Roger Dee
The story of Roger Dee is intertwined with the history of electronic music and DJ culture in Belo Horizonte, Brazil. He began his music career in 1990 after working as a graffiti artist and member of the b-boy group Crazy Break. He has opened shows for renowned Brazilian artists such as Thaíde and DJ Hum. Over time, his career has evolved and branched out into many styles, including hip hop, funk and original breakbeats as well as Brazilian music. Currently, Roger Dee operates his own label, Acla Music, and runs free workshops in Belo Horizonte dedicated to transmitting the culture of urban music to young people.

$15 includes museum admission, live entertainment, and a complimentary white sangria.

FREE for ICA members

Due to high demand, advance ticket purchase is recommended. Purchase tickets online at www.icaboston.org or by calling the ICA Box Office at 617-478-3103.

https://buy.icaboston.org/public/show.asp

https://www.facebook.com/events/448487471840158/

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group
